revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Mt. Pyre |image = [[File:Mt. Pyre.png|250px]] |caption = A map of Mt. Pyre. |tokens = 28,000 |location = East of Route 122. }} '''Mt. Pyre''' is a dungeon in [[Hoenn]]. It has 49 tiles arranged in an 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 280,000 |- | Shuppet (Boss) || 880,000 |- | Chimecho (Boss) || 880,000 |- | Duskull (Boss) || 890,000 |}
==Pokémon==
* Shuppet * Duskull * Vulpix * Wingull * Meditite * Shuppet (boss) * Duskull (boss) * Chimecho (boss)
==Items==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 50% |- | {{Bag3|Lucky Egg}} [[Lucky Egg]] || 50% |}
